title: DDFP 493: Week 4 Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & If RBs were appetizers
itunes:title: DDFP 493: Week 4 Red Challenge Flag Picks 'Menu' & If RBs were appetizers
description:
Shek is joined by Elliot Harrison and Matt "Money" Smith to discuss the state of football in Texas, the worst first place team and what they are looking forward to watching on TV this weekend. Handsome Hank joins via Skype from London to talk about the Colts vs. Jaguars matchup at Wembley Stadium. Then, in honor of his last day, Producer Sully reveals his list of top running backs and their corresponding appetizer comparisons. Plus, EmmaVP transforms Studio 66 into Mexican restaurant, "Casa de Shek" and the guys review an entire menu describing the biggest Week 4 games in this special edition of Red Challenge Flag Picks.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
